# xmlData

**Instance Property**

Returns the XML string representation of the receiver—that is, the entire document—encapsulated in a data object.

## Declaration

```swift
var xmlData: Data { get }
```

## Discussion

This method invokes [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/xmlData(options:)] with an option of `NSXMLNodeOptionsNone`. The encoding used is based on the value returned from [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/characterEncoding] or UTF-8 if no valid encoding is returned by that method.

## Writing a Document as XML Data

- **xmlData(options:)**: Returns the XML string representation of the receiver—that is, the entire document—encapsulated in a data object.
